sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { DataHere, WeatherData } from './../../models/data.components'; @Component({ selector: 'app-data', templateUrl: './data.component.html', styleUrls: ['./data.component.css'] }) export class DataComponent { @Input() dataWeather : WeatherData = { temp: 0, humidity: 0, min_temp: 0, max_temp: 0, wind_speed: 0, sunrise:0, sunset:0, }; @Input() hereData: DataHere ={ images: [], description: '' }; }
{{ dataWeather.min_temp }}
10°C
